refnamediv.refpurpose: Parameter entities which control the CALS Table Model

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: The CALS Table Model is incorporated into DocBook by reference to the standard CALS Table Model DTD. The CALS Table Model DTD, like DocBook, can be customized by defining a number of parameter entities before including it. The parameter entities in the following sections are the table-model related parameter entities defined by DocBook for use in the CALS Table Model.
